description: A government ruling allowing the demolition of a 160-year-old Manx cottage will be challenged, campaigners say.
title: Ballacain cottage: Campaigners to challenge demolition decision in court
title_page: Ballacain cottage: Campaigners to challenge demolition decision in court - BBC News
maintext: Under the proposals, the cottage and an outhouse, which have both fallen into disrepair, would be demolished to allow a larger two-storey eco-friendly house to be built.
